response.original_title: Что мне удалось подглядеть в Северной Корее
response.overview: In the second part of our film about North Korea, we peeked into real life in one of the most closed countries in the world. What does the average person's day look like? What currency do they use? Who works the fields? What do local guides hide from tourists? To answer all these questions, we grabbed a hidden camera and went filming in North Korea.
response.title: What I managed to spy on in North Korea
